title: marking-definition
description: The marking-definition object represents a specific instance of a marking, defined by an external marking system (e.g., the traffic light protocol, TLP) and contained in the definition field.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `marking-definition`.

definition.description: The detailed information of the marking. This field SHOULD be of type: tlp-marking or statement-marking.

type.description: The value of this field MUST be `tlp-marking`.

tlp.description: The TLP level of the content marked by this marking definition.

type.description: The value of this field MUST be `statement-marking`.

statement.description: A statement (e.g., copyright, terms of use) applied to the content marked by this marking definition.
